variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-bit-vector
dependencies.description: Efficient bit vector, set of integers and "big int" math library

dependencies.name: perl-datetime
dependencies.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependencies.name: perl-dbi
dependencies.description:
The DBI is the standard database interface module for Perl. It defines a
set of methods, variables and conventions that provide a consistent
database interface independent of the actual database being used.

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-rose-db
dependencies.description: A DBI wrapper and abstraction layer.

dependencies.name: perl-time-clock
dependencies.description: Twenty-four hour clock object with nanosecond precision.
